State.Author: SpringHeelJon
State.Description: Begin Again is a lightweight modlist focused on bringing the gameplay feel of later Fallout titles into Fallout 3 and New vegas. Whilst being careful to preserve what made those games unique.
State.Name: Begin Again - Wabbajack modlist for TTW

State.Author: hman101
State.Description: Adds the Drug Synthesizer, a reloading bench for chems. You can use it to breakdown chems you don't use into compounds that can be "re-synthesized" or crafted into new chems. The mod also includes a few new drugs that can be crafted.
State.Name: Drug Synthesizer - Reloading Bench for Chems

State.Author: rockbiter68
State.Description:
Clean first person animations for New Vegas. No new idles, no bugs, no reload cancelling from shooting early or crouching, no compatibility issues.



Now with kNVSE!



Please see the "Animations" section for video demonstrations of the animations. Please visit the "Changelog" tab to keep up with what is added.
State.Name: FNV Clean Animations

State.Author: migck
State.Description: Replacements for agility modifiers to reload and draw speed, strength modifiers to throwing range, and custom sneak attack damage multipliers.
State.Name: Reload Reloaded

State.Author: Roy Batty
State.Description: Removes the bonus damage effect on all Point Lookout enemies weapons.
State.Name: TTW Casual Point Lookout

State.Author: Catakysm
State.Description: Some character presets for lStewieAl's Character Preset Menu.
State.Name: Character Preset Menu - Preset Collection

State.Author: Roy Batty
State.Description:
Adds an MCM menu with options for adjust World Field of View, Player Field of View, Pipboy Field of View and Terminal Screen Field of View.

Also allows adjusting the Scope Scissor Amount, Weapon FOV Ratio, FOV Zoom time, Dialogue Zoom time and Dialogue delay time.
State.Name: FOV Slider

State.Author: jazzisparis
State.Description: An NVSE-powered plugin that is designed to manage and maintain all UI/HUD extensions added to the game by various mods. Once installed, UIO will ensure UI extensions are always properly installed and, when necessary, properly removed; it will automatically detect, resolve and prevent UI-related issues, and will help keep the game's UI intact.
State.Name: UIO - User Interface Organizer

State.Author: Nehred
State.Description: Let you ask Yes Man to open the Lucky 38 for business. With for main goal to stay vanilla friendly.
State.Name: Wild Card - Open the Lucky 38

State.Author: c6
State.Description: Displays remaining duration of consumed Aid items on the HUD.
State.Name: AidUI

State.Author: B42
State.Description: A mod that adds melee attacks for non-melee weapons, similar to melee hits and buttstrokes in modern FPS games.
State.Name: B42 Melee Bash

State.Author: ItsMeJesusHChrist also known as LOC or The Icon Guy
State.Description: Cleans up HUD textures (such as the compass ticks or other arrows) that have went unnoticed. The cleaning consists of removing the old noise, and sometimes i replace the old noise with a new one.
State.Name: Vanilla Hud Cleaned

State.Author: Luthien Anarion
State.Description: Emulates keyboard and mouse inputs when controller buttons are pressed.
State.Name: Controller Support NVSE

State.Author: Scott Clam
State.Description: An overhaul of the weathers in New Vegas with 360 panoramic cloud textures, DLC support, and optional presets for Reshade and ENB.
State.Name: Desert Natural Weathers

State.Author: hman101
State.Description:
Adds Skrim-esque weapon displays.



Fully compatible with weapons from all the DLC and weapons added by other mods.



Contains patches for TTW and modded player homes
State.Name: Dynamic Weapon Displays

State.Author: yvileapsis and others
State.Description:
A collection of my mods, merged for convenience. 

Requires JIP LN NVSE and JohnnyGuitar NVSE.
State.Name: JAM - Just Assorted Mods

State.Author: tomzik
State.Description: A collection of new, low poly models to use during generating LOD.
State.Name: LOD additions and improvements

State.Author: lStewieAl
State.Description:
Engine bugfixes, optional tweaks and new features with no performance impact. Fully customisable via in-game menu and INIs. 

Includes Inventory Searching, Cookable Grenades, Manual Reload, Smooth Aiming, WASD Menu Support and more. 

Fully compatible with TTW and The Frontier.
State.Name: lStewieAl's Tweaks and Engine Fixes

State.Author: Nehred
State.Description: Adds a bunch of features to the Main and Pause menus. Fully customizable.
State.Name: Main and Pause Menus Overhaul

State.Author: Pelinor
State.Description: Allows any number of mods to be configured from a single menu.
State.Name: The Mod Configuration Menu

State.Author: W0lfwang
State.Description: This mod does exactly what it says, it will remove the Pip-Boy when equipping a Power Armor and restore it when using any other armor! Power Armor uses the West Tek Holographic Control Panel to navigate menus!... Also a Pip-Boy Glove Remover and Pip-boy accelerator!
State.Name: No PipBoy in Power Armor (Pip-boy Remover)

State.Author: MadAce
State.Description: Improves ragdoll behaviour for all NPC/Creatures in the game, restored hit reactions, configurable forces, ragdoll momentum and much more...
State.Name: Ragdolls

Original.Name: Sweet 6 Shooter Perk Pack TTW Version-73438-15-12-1672435707.rar

State.Author: S6S
State.Description:
This is a pack of 48 new perks and 10 traits, designed with TTW in mind, and any mod which re-enables the Big Guns skill.

NV Version available!

All perks are hide-able.
State.Name: Sweet 6 Shooter Perks - TTW - NV - Configurable

State.Author: IntenseMute
State.Description: Allows you to edit the HUD...
State.Name: The HUD Editor

State.Author: doodlez  L00  fadingsignal
State.Description: Advanced overhaul for the weather system in The Capital Wasteland, The Pitt, Anchorage, and Point Lookout, which stays true to the original mood of the game.
State.Name: True Weathers TTW

State.Author: pintocat - Roy Batty
State.Description: This removes message boxes that pop up during the tutorial, as well as one-time help pop-ups,  repeating corner-messages.
State.Name: Tutorial Killer

State.Author: Kezyma
State.Description: Root Builder is a Mod Organizer 2 plugin that allows you to manage files in the base game folder through Mod Organizer, leaving your game folder in pristine, vanilla condition!
State.Name: Kezyma's Root Builder for Mod Organizer

State.Author: g0kur
State.Description: Adds 360 degrees movements with procedural leaning, and auto vanity mode to make the game feel more like later Bethesda games.
State.Name: 360 Movement

State.Author: Hitman47101
State.Description: Threw everything I had into one pack to celebrate 10 years of... this.
State.Name: Anniversary Anim Pack

State.Author: Hitman47101 and Uploader
State.Description: Fixed camera jumps, animation snapping, movement lock, broken aim in 3rd person.
State.Name: Anniversary Anim Pack - General Bugfix

State.Author: Hitman47101 and Hopper31
State.Description:
What's this? Another collab!? GASP.



New animation set for the Arc Welder, plus the added ability for it to arc between targets and a damage buff!
State.Name: Arcing Arc Welder

State.Author: Quicksilver500
State.Description: Allows you to holster up to 4 weapons on your body at once. Allows you to holster any weapon type in any of four locations on your body. No compatibility patches required.  No biped slots used. Adds visible holsters to weapons.
State.Name: Armed to the Teeth - Redux

State.Author: B42 Team and fantastic Fallout New Vegas community
State.Description:
Adds descriptions to all items in the game. For extra roleplaying experience.

This mod is community-driven and is part of the Project B42

Contributions are welcome!
State.Name: B42 Descriptions aka Pip-Info

State.Author: Pistol Payback
State.Description: Adds the Fallout 4 burrowing functionality, Cazador nest, and a few new creatures. Complete with an MCM to toggle parts of the mod you do and don't want.
State.Name: Burrowing Creatures

State.Author: LD228
State.Description:
Canon duster from the artwork and few more...

Male and Female
State.Name: Canon courier duster

State.Author: fryar1992
State.Description: Fallout 3 Style Loading Screen Replacer for Tale of Two Wastelands
State.Name: Consistent Loading Screens for TTW

State.Author: rockbiter68
State.Description:
Clean first person animations for New Vegas. No new idles, no bugs, no reload cancelling from shooting early or crouching, no compatibility issues.



Now with kNVSE!



Please see the "Animations" section for video demonstrations of the animations. Please visit the "Changelog" tab to keep up with what is added.
State.Name: FNV Clean Animations

State.Author: Hitman47101
State.Description: A lot of anims.
State.Name: Hit's Anims - Season 2

State.Author: Hitman47101
State.Description: Far too many anims.
State.Name: Hit's Anims - Season 3

State.Author: BrainBoxLtd
State.Description: A patched version of TheKetzku's original Immersive Pickup Sounds mod that adds a variety of sound effects for picking up numerous items. This version converts all sound effects to mono to prevent a glitch where NPC's picking up an item would play the sound effects at full volume regardless of where they were in relation to the player.
State.Name: Immersive Pickup Sounds Patched

State.Author: jazzisparis
State.Description: This mod makes the crafting interface (Recipe Menu) easier, more efficient and less tedious to use. Now ESPless.
State.Name: JIP Improved Recipe Menu ESPless

State.Author: Nehred
State.Description: Removes the muzzle flash lights to boost performances.
State.Name: No More Muzzle Flash Lights

State.Author: WebbProductions2020
State.Description: Welcome fellow modder to Webb's Titans of The New West Patch Emporium. Find the patch for your power armor mod here!
State.Name: Webb's Titans of The New West Patch Emporium

State.Author: pommymax
State.Description: HD Retextures of all Caesar's Legion armors, Marked Men armors, + more.
State.Name: PM's HD Legion Overhaul

State.Author: Strider
State.Description: Custom high resolution textures for all the power armors in NV and TTW.
State.Name: Power Armor Visual Enhancement

State.Author: Nehred
State.Description: Securitrons' faces will change when they enter combat mode.
State.Name: Securitrons On Alert

State.Author: Tecium
State.Description: New models and textures to improve the LOD.
State.Name: TCM's LOD Overhaul

State.Author: 0spacepope0 Ultra
State.Description: Patches 0spacepope0's excellent combat armor retexture mod with custom retextures by myself for TTW-Fo3.
State.Name: The Gruntening - 2k Combat Armor Retextures TTW Patch

State.Author: Wombat
State.Description: Massive update to classic style heavy power armor mod that adds lots of new content, new features, optimizations, and native TTW support.
State.Name: Titans of The New West 2.0

State.Author: zzjay
State.Description:
I always tought vanilla hairs werw a bit too hiny...this mod will fix that.

Normalmaps replacer for vanilla hairs.
State.Name: Vanilla Hair - No Shine

State.Author: Farsveinn
State.Description: Textures for Vanilla/WMIM/TTW taken from the EVE. Fixed some missing textures for modifications.
State.Name: Weapon Retexture from EVE

State.Author: Heaven3xx3
State.Description: An HD 2K weapon retexture pack that aims to update all of the weapon textures of NV to a new era
State.Name: WTH - Weapon Textures from Heaven

Original.Name: TTW's Hunting Rifle and .32 Rifle Textures-69837-1-0-1599238845.rar

State.Author: Heaven3xx3
State.Description: An HD 2K weapon retexture pack that aims to update all of the weapon textures of NV to a new era
State.Name: WTH - Weapon Textures from Heaven

State.Author: Wall_SoGB
State.Description: Drastically improves performance on The Strip by getting rid of... water LOD
State.Name: Aqua Performa - Strip Performance Fix

State.Author: Scott Clam
State.Description: Adjusted alpha properties on litter pile meshes so they don't go pitch black when the pipboy light is on them.
State.Name: Black Litter Pile Fix

Original.Name: 1. Butcher Pete Complete - A Melee Animation Overhaul (Hitman Locomotion)-79146-1-0-1669917098.rar

State.Author: rockbiter68
State.Description:
A comprehensive melee animation overhaul for almost every single one-handed melee weapon in New Vegas, its DLCs, and TTW.



Chop, slice, and bludgeon that Pete.
State.Name: Butcher Pete Complete - A Melee Animation Overhaul

State.Author: ItsMeJesusHChrist also known as LOC or The Icon Guy
State.Description: This is a lore-friendly, mostly hand-drawn, total overhaul mod that tweaks around 3600 icons which made them immersively more consistent in terms of coloring and transparency. There are other bug fixes too, and many new details! Okay, just write that in the brief overview, it's not that hard.
State.Name: Consistent Pip-Boy Icons

Original.Name: Elijah Voice Files Fix - WAV Encoding-73526-0-2-1663705815.7z

State.Author: Chloe
State.Description: Attempt to fix Elijah's voice loudness and clipping issues in Dead Money.
State.Name: Elijah Voice Audio Files Fix

State.Author: Nehred
State.Description: Make it harder to access The Strip.
State.Name: Harder New Vegas Strip Access

State.Author: Original mods by Hitman47101
State.Description: Patches some of the weapon left over from Hitman's animation packs so they use their proper animations, along with other fixes. Covers Seasons 1, 2 and 3.
State.Name: Hit's Anims - Animation Fixes

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: JSawyer's popular mod, fully re-implemented from the ground up. Compatibility has been greatly improved, errors have been fixed, and balance corrections have been expanded - all whilst trying to maintain the original mod's vision.
State.Name: JSawyer Ultimate Edition

State.Author: Adonis VII
State.Description: Alters MFC Grenade and Grenade Clusters to use normal MFC texture path so texture replacers work.
State.Name: MFC Grenade Texture Fix

State.Author: Someteam2000
State.Description: Pursue high-risk/high-reward bounties in the first installment of the The Someguy Series.
State.Name: New Vegas Bounties I LE

State.Author: Xamie
State.Description: New/Tweaked models and textures for TTW's R91/g3(Assault Rifle), Wanda and Infiltrator/Perforator.
State.Name: R91 and Friends

State.Author: AgentFuse
State.Description: A small mod that lets the player walk up to the Sierra Madre, rather than just teleporting into the lobby.
State.Name: Sierra Madre Grand Entrance

State.Author: Qolore7 - Moburma - Schizofriendlia
State.Description: Modern recreation of Strip Open, featuring many bug fixes, occlusion panes, and fixed meshes to deliver a much more stable, performance friendly, and bug free experience
State.Name: Simple Open Strip

State.Author: Darian Stephens
State.Description: Switches various sounds between their NV and Fo3 counterparts when in their respective wasteland.
State.Name: TTW - Wasteland Sounds

State.Author: Nehred
State.Description: Improve some aspects of the Vikki & Vance casino so it actually looks like a casino while staying true to the vanilla aesthetic. More details in the description.
State.Name: Vikki and Vance Improvements

State.Author: llamaRCA and Nivea
State.Description: Willow is not the usual girl companion. She is a story-driven character with over 1200 lines of voiced dialogue. She enriches your gameplay experience with her complex companion behaviors and her responses to the gameworld.
State.Name: Willow - A Better Companion Experience

State.Author: Bethesda Games Skyrim
State.Description: Brings VATS melee animations back from the dead, thanks to kNVSE
State.Name: Melee VATS Animation Restoration

State.Author: nickheggo HULKHOD3N
State.Description: Replaces the vanilla footstep sounds with way more realistic sounding ones, as well as adding over 60 additional sounds and fixing some engine issues.
State.Name: Project Reality Footsteps FNV

State.Author: Wombat
State.Description: Massive update to classic style heavy power armor mod that adds lots of new content, new features, optimizations, and native TTW support.
State.Name: Titans of The New West 2.0

State.Author: Slippy
State.Description: Take junk you find out in the wasteland and use it for weapon and armor repair after putting in a little bit of work.
State.Name: Alternative Repairing

State.Author: Qolore7
State.Description: HUD elements will only show under certain conditions, configurable via an INI. A modern spiritual successor to Immersive HUD
State.Name: Contextual HUD

State.Author: Roy Batty
State.Description: Moves your gear to after the spacewalk to make Zeta more challenging
State.Name: TTW Hardcore Zeta

Original.Name: Less Flickery City of New Vegas-72061-0-01-1618409500.zip

State.Author: FaramH
State.Description: If you play NV at higher than normal settings, you'll notice intense flickering in the city of New Vegas (e.g. when looking from Goodsprings cemetery) due to extra white proxy meshes clipping into the object LOD meshes. This simple mod fixes that (does not fix the engine Z-fighting) by removing the offending white imposter meshes.
State.Name: Less Flickery City of New Vegas

State.Author: BobG123
State.Description: Dislike seeing faces being eaten by mold spawned from a cosmic horror? A lot of characters (usually with darker skin) are affected by an unsightly green tint, though it can affect characters with lighter skin as well. This mod gets rid of those tints. Mostly, hence the not very catchy title.
State.Name: Mostly Fixed FaceGen Tints (NV or TTW)

State.Author: S6S
State.Description:
This small mod adds a Vendortron kiosk and a few workbenches to Canterbury Commons.

Comes in two flavors: full Gun Runner stock, and 188 stock. The latter has fewer weapons.
State.Name: Vendyboi 2 - Canterbury Commons Vendortron

State.Author: darthbdaman
State.Description: Allows characters to equip Recon Armor under their Power Armor. Works on the player, followers, and all NPCs.
State.Name: Recon Under Armor (JIP LN NVSE) (JohnnyGuitar) (ShowOff)

State.Author: Made by ElPascal - v1 61 kindly provided by Kazopert
State.Description: This mod adds hundreds of npcs and several scripted events to the world of Fallout: New Vegas; people patrolling the roads, traveling between towns, occupying locations, exploring the desert and reacting dynamically to your choices throughout the game. The Mojave will never feel empty again.
State.Name: The Living Desert - Travelers Patrols Consequences Increased Population and more

State.Author: jazzisparis and LuthienAnarion
State.Description:
This plugin is an extension of the New Vegas Script Extender (NVSE). It adds 1000+ new functions, which can be used in GECK scripting and (in some cases) as conditions.

Additionally, this mod includes numerous engine bug fixes/tweaks, and restores several broken game features.
State.Name: JIP LN NVSE Plugin

Original.Name: Tweaks for TTW - Titans of the New West 2.0 Patch-78914-1-1-1668355548.7z

State.Author: NeonNito
State.Description: Patches the Power Armors added by "Tweaks for TTW" to be consistent with the style of "Titans of the New West 2.0" and applies the scripts to all armors
State.Name: Tweaks for TTW - Titans of the New West 2.0 Patch

State.Author: Nehred - Sigerious
State.Description: Plays animations when interacting with objects, opening/closing doors and picking up items.
State.Name: Animated Player Interactions

Original.Name: Tale of Bi Wastelands - TTW New Vegas Speech Checks-76206-1-0-1650363409.7z

State.Author: seancdaug
State.Description: Two tiny patches to ensure proper functionality between pintocat's Tale of Bi Wastelands TTW and Kazopert's TTW Reputations and TTW New Vegas Speech Checks.
State.Name: Tale of Bi Wastelands TTW Patches for TTW Reputations and TTW New Vegas Speech Checks

State.Author: S6S
State.Description: This file stops Tranquility Lane from de-aging you to child, which broke any race replacers which don't have child versions, and doesn't touch your pip boy, for better compatibility with pip boy replacers which get screwed up by the removal, addition, and re-equipping of the pipboy and glove.
State.Name: Tranquility Lane Pipboy Glove and Custom Race Fix

State.Author: Roy Batty
State.Description: ROOGNVSE plugin expands karma titles and adds a few functions for scripting.
State.Name: ROOGNVSE Plugin

State.Author: S6S
State.Description: JIP's Localized DT/DR setting is very cool, but the player's head generally having a higher damage multiplier generally results in AI almost exclusively targeting the player's head, effectively making body armor useless in the majority of circumstances. This small scriptrunner just standardizes all of the player's body part damage multipliers.
State.Name: JIP Localized Damage Fix

State.Author: Ragamuffin Skullman
State.Description: Patches Brandherre's Unique Fort Armor for TOTNW 2.0 support. PAVE and vanilla style versions included.
State.Name: Unique Fort Armor - Titans of the New West 2.0 Patch

State.Author: Psychor
State.Description: Human staggering now looks awesome. A simple and essential animation replacer. Use this with Awesome Crippling Effects 2 for an insane cinematic effect.
State.Name: Awesome Staggering

State.Author: S6S
State.Description: Distributes Mojave weapons to sources in the Capital Wasteland, for TTW. Configurable with ini options. Scripted for compatibility.
State.Name: DC Arsenal - TTW Mojave Weapon Distribution - Lore Friendly

Original.Name: Benny Humbles You and Steals Your Stuff-71112-12-1659489688.rar

State.Author: S6S
State.Description: A subsidiary variant of Benny Humbles You, this mod takes all the player's gear when they enter the Mojave, locks it in a safe in the Tops Presidential Suite, and gives Benny the key. A vanilla flavored way to get back your gear, without getting it too early. Includes Mojave starting gear overhaul, and two perks.
State.Name: (Benny Humbles You) and Steals Your Stuff

State.Author: Roni
State.Description: Atmospheric Lighting Tweaks makes changes to Image Spaces and Lighting Templates to give interiors a more dynamic and atmospheric look.
State.Name: Atmospheric Lighting Tweaks (FNV and TTW)

State.Author: Lime
State.Description: Reworks vanilla faction safehouses to be more atmospheric, useful & true to their associated groups. This mod completely redecorates & redesigns the NCR, Brotherhood, Legion and Followers Safehouses. Each has had it's own perks reworked and improved upon, with new commissary terminals replacing and evolving upon vanilla caretaker characters
State.Name: Lime's Faction Safehouse Overhaul

State.Author: Roy Batty
State.Description: Replaces all static containers with lootable equivalents.
State.Name: Root 'n Loot TTW

State.Author: Alo Bautist
State.Description: Farms locations, new recipes, working ovens and a campfire into the Wasteland.
State.Name: TTW Cooking Revolution

State.Author: Nehred
State.Description: Improve some aspects of the Vikki & Vance casino so it actually looks like a casino while staying true to the vanilla aesthetic. More details in the description.
State.Name: Vikki and Vance Improvements

State.Author: hman101
State.Description: Killing any npc, regardless of their karma alignment and even if they are attacking you, causes you to lose a small amount of karma. This mod should make it slightly more difficult to maintain good karma. It was mainly made with TTW in mind, but works with just FNV as well. Includes a config file to set how much karma is lost.
State.Name: Killing Costs Karma

State.Author: AmaccurzerO - Nehred
State.Description: This mod adds a lip sync animation to the securitrons. Read description to see the list of the securitrons affected. Watch video.
State.Name: NV Securitrons Lip Sync

State.Author: Kain Prime
State.Description: This mod fixes all the power fist type weapons by removing the pointless block from the top of the gloves.
State.Name: Prime Fisting - Power Fist Glove Fixes

State.Author: hman101
State.Description: A simple and modular disease system for Fallout New Vegas. Adds a the chance to get sick from eating bad food and drinking untreated water as well as the risk of contracting diseases from wild animal attacks.
State.Name: Simple Diseases

State.Author: Original mods by Hitman47101
State.Description: Patches some of the weapon left over from Hitman's animation packs so they use their proper animations, along with other fixes. Covers Seasons 1, 2 and 3.
State.Name: Hit's Anims - Animation Fixes

State.Author: BlooperReel
State.Description: A modern alternative to Populated Casinos. Realistic casino populations with an emphasis on minimal amounts of new NPCs, plus better performance and stability.
State.Name: Casino Crowds

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: SImple and customisable reduced food healing effects, to help balance Survival versus Medicine. Affects all items, including from other mods.
State.Name: Food Effect Tweaks - Custom Food Healing

Original.Name: JSawyer Ultimate Canon Courier Duster Patch-77053-1-1655168734.7z

State.Author: demian94
State.Description: Gives the Courier Armors from the Canon Courier Armor patch the same stats and bonuses as the NCR Ranger Combat Armor in JSawyer mod. Gives the Courier Hats the same stats and bonuses as the 1st Recon Beret in vanilla\JSawyer.
State.Name: JSawyer Canon Courier Armor Patch

Original.Name: Tale of Bi Wastelands - TTW Reputations patch-76206-1-0-1650363344.7z

State.Author: seancdaug
State.Description: Two tiny patches to ensure proper functionality between pintocat's Tale of Bi Wastelands TTW and Kazopert's TTW Reputations and TTW New Vegas Speech Checks.
State.Name: Tale of Bi Wastelands TTW Patches for TTW Reputations and TTW New Vegas Speech Checks

State.Author: S6S
State.Description: This mod makes explosive traps use explosives, survival, or science skills instead of repair, which is already super useful.
State.Name: Traps Tweaks - Traps Use Other Skills

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: A simple and comprehensive loot scarcity mod using event-based scripting. Trust us. Bring a magazine.
State.Name: Famine - A Loot Rarity Mod

State.Author: The Dormies - Demorome and Trooper
State.Description:
An NVSE plugin which adds new functions and engine-level tweaks.

For heathens who have forsaken the Vanilla-Style way.
State.Name: ShowOff NVSE Plugin

State.Author: zedas
State.Description: An enhancement to the shoddy work on the vanilla functional streetlamps & lights of Outer Vegas, Camp McCarran, Camp Golf, and NCRCF.
State.Name: A Little More Lamplight

State.Author: Psychor
State.Description: Landing on the ground will cause you to stumble, roll, or collapse. Includes 11 animations.
State.Name: Falling And Landing Animated

State.Author: grasscid
State.Description:
Ever notice how meaningless the Karma system is?

Not anymore.
State.Name: Karma Perks

State.Author: migck
State.Description: Yep. You never knew it was even possible, you never wondered if you even needed it, I am not your king.
State.Name: NAWEMO - NPCs use Ammo Variants and Weapon Mods

State.Author: hman101
State.Description: Merges my smaller TTW mods into a collection of miscellaneous tweaks for TTW. Also includes some new tweaks. Fully customizable using a config file.
State.Name: Tweaks for TTW

State.Author: Xilandro x Carxt x JazzIsParis
State.Description: This mod, thanks to JazzIsParis magic, adds diagonal movement. Simple as that.
State.Name: Diagonal movement

State.Author: Mmoplayer75
State.Description: This will prevent Dogmeat from barking or prevent Dogmeat from barking at you with every 10-15 steps
State.Name: Stop Barking At Me. TTW

State.Author: Rocket
State.Description: This redesigns Joshua Graham, The Burned Man, to much more closely match his appearance in the game art. Now he actually looks burnt!
State.Name: Authentic Burned Man

State.Author: VishVadeva50
State.Description: Patches for TTW and more.
State.Name: Vish's Patch Hub (TTW)

State.Author: pintocat
State.Description: Adds Confirmed Bachelor and Cherchez La Femme options to mirror any Black Widow and Lady Killer options in Fallout 3 and its DLC, and adds new ones for the canonically gay and lesbian merchants, and an option to tell Dad.
State.Name: Tale of Bi Wastelands TTW

Original.Name: TTW Hardcore Zeta - Delay DLC Redux Patch-78488-1-0-1664332632.7z

State.Author: VishVadeva50
State.Description: Patches a single script between TTW Hardcore Zeta and Delay DLC Redux (TTW Version).
State.Name: TTW Hardcore Zeta - Delay DLC Redux Patch

State.Author: iranrmrf
State.Description: This plugin fixes the Fallout New Vegas mod limit bug. It allows a maximum of 255 plugins to be loaded. It can also cause an increase in fps, remove game stutter and allow for faster loading times especially when using a large number of mods.
State.Name: FNV Mod Limit Fix

State.Author: The Dormies - Demorome and Trooper
State.Description:
An NVSE plugin which adds new functions and engine-level tweaks.

For heathens who have forsaken the Vanilla-Style way.
State.Name: ShowOff NVSE Plugin

State.Author: Hitman47101 and Uploader

State.Author: S6S
State.Description: This is just a little scriptrunner to fix a long-running bug all the way from Fallout 3's original release, where the .32 Pistol was using 7.62 Rifle Bullet Projectiles, causing the bullets to clip through the gun as they're fired. All this does is change the model path of the projectile to the .357's bullet model.

State.Author: hectrol
State.Description:
This skin modifies the aspect of default boring tumbleweeds by realistic tumbleweeds, and adds a new Normal Map:

- Improved or adding new details.
- Sharpen detail definition effect.
- Textures and Normal Maps increased to 2048x2048. [Defaults 512x512 and 64x64]
-----------------------------------------------------------
Este skin modifica e
State.Name: Hectrol Tumbleweed Deluxe HighRes Retex
